name: FrinkiacMMSBot
description: A Twilio powered bot for sending Simpson's screenshots.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio Account SID from www.twilio.com/console.

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio Auth Token from www.twilio.com/console.

TWILIO_NUMBER.description: A Twilio phone number you own.

PHONE_NUMBER.description: The phone number you would like to send your messages to.
